ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | shne0.1 | |- A e. SH |

| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_shsval3i | |- ( A +H 0H ) = ( span ` ( A u. 0H ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_sh0le | |- ( A e. SH -> 0H C_ A ) |

| 6 |  | #P_ssequn2 | |- ( 0H C_ A <-> ( A u. 0H ) = A ) |

| 9 |  | #P_spanid | |- ( A e. SH -> ( span ` A ) = A ) |
| 10 | 1, 9 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( span ` A ) = A |
| 11 | 3, 8, 10 | #P_3eqtri | |- ( A +H 0H ) = A |
